total number of CDS where len >= 4k is 3473
number_of_exons is 6
intron_gap is 8333
note that every intron is the same
length of one of the exons is 5016
length of one of the exons is 4095
length of one of the exons is 7935
length of one of the exons is 6474
length of one of the exons is 8112
length of one of the exons is 22257
